content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
FINISH THE FIGHT
EA SPORTS™ UFC® 2 innovates with stunning character likeness and animation, adds an all new Knockout Physics System and authentic gameplay features, and invites all fighters to step back into the Octagon® to experience the thrill of finishing the fight. The Deluxe edition includes 5 of the most legendary fighters on the planet, ''Iron'' Mike Tyson, ''Legacy'' Mike Tyson, Bas Rutten, Kazushi Sakuraba and Bruce Lee and 1600 UFC points for UFC Ultimate team.


1-2 players
Network Players 2-2
14GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output
Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

* Internet connection and EA Account required. Must be 13+ to create an account.
**ADDED VALUE CALCULATED BASED ON UFC ULTIMATE TEAM PREMIUM PACK PRICE AT GAME LAUNCH. PRICES MAY CHANGE. Offer restrictions apply. Please see www.easports.com/ufc/game-and-offer-disclaimers for details.

©2016 Electronic Arts Inc. Ultimate Fighting Championship®, Ultimate Fighting®, UFC®, The Ultimate Fighter™, Octagon Girls®, Submission®, As Real As It Gets®, Zuffa®, The Octagon® and the eight-sided competition mat and cage design are trademarks of Zuffa, LLC
attributes.name: EA SPORTS™ UFC® 2 Deluxe Edition
